Windlord:

Windlord send a encoded message to ROdimus Prime "Elita is all 
right, she's with Cam and Kup right now somewhere inside the base... 
The base is with shields up. Come back when this battle is over, 
Rodimus, we have to avenge Condor and bring Nightlight back"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> The swords and tails rip the underbelly of Rodimus' car mode to 
shreds. However since he was airborn and still moveing from his 
300mph thrust, he continued at Hydras.
> OOC: He cant really stop untill he hits something that'll do the 
job. He is supposed to have one hell of a collision with Hydras.
>  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Hydras watched as the bot kept 
coming...."Aww crap" for rodimus was upon him 
> and he thrusted both his swords and tails at him instinctivly.
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Hydras' shots all strike Rodimus, sending parts flying off of 
him. He lets out a 
> > roar as the pain surges through him. However he was still coming 
at Hydras!
> >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:OOC:sheesh you call that a little?
> > Hydras let out a roar of pain as the kick sent him flying 
backwards, The fire 
> > closed around the rocks moved closing his wounds. Perceptor's 
message bellowed

your anger I love 
> > it!" As Rodimus lept off at incredible speed He shot fire from 
his mouth,the 
> > two tails lashing out toslice open the bot, his eyes shot out 
the lasers and 
> > his shoulder blasters rang out 15 shots all right onto the 
coming Rodimus.
> > > 
> > > OOC: I hope you dont mind a little CC. I posted for a little 
damage to Hydras, 
> > > but nothing critical.
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > Rodimus brought his arms down in a "x" formation, forcing the 
swords, and 
> > > Hydras' arms down. Rodimus then grabbed Hydras around the 
wrist with his left 
> > > hand. He dug his saw which was in the place of his right hand, 
down into 
> > Hydras' 
> > > arm. With his balance on his left arm, Roddy flipped both legs 
up to double 
> > > dropkick Hydras. After hitting this he back flips away and to 
his feet.
> > > Just then Perceptor is heard over the comm system.
> > > Rodimus stands motionless, and optics look empty, like all 
hope had been lost. 
> > > But then...
> > > Rodimus Prime: Enough of this! Maximals, kill these bastards 
in cold fluid!
> > > Rodimus' face shows nothing but hate. He grits his teeth 
together, while 
> > letting 
> > > out an yell that could destroy an audio receptor. He is almost 
fomeing at the 
> > > mouth, with the mixed mech fluids that leak from it. The anger 
causes his > 
> > normally blue optic sensors to turn a crimson red. His gaze 
locked on Hydras.
> > > Rodimus empties his mouth, spitting all the energon and other 
mech fluids from 
> > > his mouth at Hydras.
> > > Rodimus Prime: On this day, Galvatron, I'll finally KILL 
YOU!!!!!!!!
> > > Rodimus transformes to car mode and fires his propulsion 
rockets. Full power 
> > all 
> > > at once, sending Rodimus Prime at Hydras' gut at an airborn 
300mph!
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > At the Maximal base Kup was about to take Elita from Cam...
> > > Kup: Give her here...
> > > When Perceptos message came over the comm sytem as well as a 
picture on all of 
> > > the monitors.
> > > Kup: By primus no... How could they?! She was a mother, a good 
bot, she didn't 
> > > deserve this. They targeted her just to get at Rodimus...
> > > Kup drops to the floor.
> > > Kup: Cam, you may have to help with that baby more if you can. 
Her father is 
> > the 
> > > commander, and she just lost her mother...
> > > Kup looks up at the picture of Perceptor on the monitor.
> > > Kup: Rodimus will lose all control now. I fear that are leader 
is gone, and a 
> > > killing machine is in his place. I actually pitty those 
Predacons now, for 
> > what 
> > > Rodimus will do to them. May primus have pitty on their 
sparks...
